mapper.select: SELECT `u`.`id` AS `id`, `t`.`teacher_code` AS `teacherCode`, `t`.`name` AS `name`, `t`.`identification_number` AS `identificationNumber`, `t`.`job_status` AS `jobStatus`, `u`.`account` AS `account`, `u`.`role_id` AS `roleIds` FROM `teacher` `t` JOIN `blade_user` `u` ON `t`.`user_id` = `u`.`id` WHERE `u`.`id` = #{id}
